Menace
When a creature scavenges this creature, return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Scavenge {4}{U} [i]({4}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
